name: Residence Inn Harrisonburg

reviews.text: Those who've stayed here always, always come back. Since the hotel opened several years ago we've stayed for brief (one night) to lengthy (7 months) periods of time. Staff members -- from management, front desk, housekeeping and maintenance -- are top-notch. We feel fortunate to have made the acquaintance of so many nice people. The hotel is well-located, tidy and offers great amenities. A word to the wise: book early.
reviews.title: Home Sweet Home for Seven Months

reviews.text: Newer Marriott property, kept in excellent condition, very clean, friendly staff, love the open fire pit for Fall evenings, after football games won by JMU!!! Enjoy a glass of wine, barbeque some burgers! Hotel staff are friendly, helpful & generate team spirit for the JMU Dukes!!! If you are tail-gaiters. the full size ovens in the suites are very handy for preparing your hot tail-gate favorite dishes!!!!
reviews.title: Our Favorite JMU Week-end Home-away-from Home

reviews.text: This was the BEST Marriott experience I ever had! I have been a gold member for years and this property treated us top notch. The property itself is excellent! The purpose of my stay was a overnight stop-over to South Carolina to attend my Grandmothers funeral. A friend of mine accompanied me for driving and moral support. As soon as we arrived at this property for the stop over, Savanna and Elle made us feel welcomed. One of them even came from around the "check-in" desk and stood next to us to explain all the amenities of the property. That was a great touch! I then explained to them the purpose of my trip and they were genuinely caring and expressed to me that they would make our stay as comfortable as possible. They even took the time to write a hand written sympathy card to our family and slipped it under our door! Savanna nor Elle were there when we checked out, but I want them to know that their kindness, helpfulness and caring made a HUGE difference in the trip to my Grandmothers funeral in SC. I don't know if they knew what impact they had on me. Thanks Savanna and Elle! Keep doing what you do! It makes a difference in peoples lives and their travels thru it!!
reviews.title: EXCELLENT FROM THE MOMENT OF ARRIVAL!!!

reviews.text: I wanted to write Tim Fitzgerald an email to personally thank his 2 employees, but could not find his email. I noticed he replies at times to tripadvisor, so I hope he reads this!! Thanks Tim for having employees like Savanna and Elle!!!
reviews.title: Walls are too thin

reviews.text: I want to give this hotel five starts, I really do. Unfortunately, the walls are too thin and if you have a loud neighbor you may be in for a long night.
reviews.title: Great place!!

reviews.text: We have been visiting Harrisonburg for 4 years, since our daughter started at JMU, and didn't know this hotel existed until this visit, when by chance we discovered a cancellation during a sold out football weekend. We LOVED this hotel. Extremely nice staff, impeccably clean and BEAUTIFUL room, hotel conveniently located yet still seemed peaceful. Worth every penny. Didn't book the room expecting a studio apartment feel more than a typical hotel room, but LOVED the convenience of the full refrig, the cooktop, the sink, the desk area, and the decor of the whole thing. The firepit in the courtyard just added to the great ambiance. Good breakfast, too!
reviews.title: I want to live there...

reviews.text: Over the last three years, we have stayed at this hotel on numerous occasions (even had reservations while it was under construction) and most recently stayed in May. Not sure if they have new management or new ownership but the service has gone downhill.
reviews.title: Going downhill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are select guests with Marriott and have "Extra Towels" on our guest profile. When we arrived, we were given the towels. On the second day, the maid left us with one bath towel, one hand towel and one face cloth. When asked why the maid did not replenish our towels, the front desk personnel stated the maid probably ran out of towels.
reviews.title: Not as new as I thought

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At breakfast, we noticed that the kitchen personnel were handling the garbage cans with their bare hands and then restocking items in the food lines, without washing their hands (ugh) or wearing gloves. Not exactly what you would expect from a premium Marriott hotel.
reviews.title: Beautiful, New Upscale Property

reviews.text: On our last day, Sunday, we called the front desk personnel to ask for late check out and were asked how late we needed the room. We responded that we needed the room until 1:00pm and he said that could not be done because the maids did not work a shift that late. (Why did he ask if he knew it could not be done?) The reason we were late is because the clocks in the room were an hour off and we almost missed church.
reviews.title: Best stay on entire trip

reviews.text: We stayed at the Residence Inn over the Christmas holiday. The hotel was lovely, the facilities were great, and the staff was very friendly. The suite itself was comfortable - it was great to have the combination of communal and private spaces, and the convenience of a kitchen. Our only complaint (from all four adults in the suite) was that we all found the beds extremely uncomfortable.
reviews.title: Great - Except for Beds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our recent trip to Harrisonburg for the graduation of our Granddaughter from JMU, we
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: stayed for 2 nights at the Residence Inn. We found the staff, especially Caroline and CC,
reviews.title: best choice in harrisonburg & dog friendly !! :)

reviews.text: very friendly and accommodating. We were upgraded to a 1 bedroom suite because of a
reviews.title: Great Experience!

reviews.text: slight medical problem which was very much appreciated. The room was very comfortable
reviews.title: Terriific facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All of the personnel at the hotel were extremely friendly. Many of the people working there walked around the breakfast area talking to the guests and cleaning off tables to ensure everyone had a place to seat and eat.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: We rented a studio room that was clean. Loved the decor in the room.
reviews.title: Best kept secret on the highway!

reviews.text: My only complaint would be no ice machine on the second floor. The hotel directory states no need to go to ice machine since the refrigerator contained an ice machine. After several hours, the bucket only had a few ice cubes.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay
Much better then expected
reviews.text: What a gem. I loved this place. Clean, great breakfast, nice and easy location, good restaraunts close by (walking distance), nice pool and hot tub.

reviews.title: Hotel or home?
reviews.text: Only con - they screw up your rewards and the front desk personnel seems untrained. But be patient because they will make it right if you allow it. That's says a lot in my book. They also do it with a smile.

description: Harrisonburg's newest upscale extended stay hotel! Located in the gorgeous Shenandoah Valley of Virginia, the Residence Inn by Marriott Harrisonburg is the ideal choice for a quick trip or a long stay. We are conveniently located just minutes from James Madison University, Massanutten recreation area, Skyline Drive and the Blue Ridge Parkway. The Residence Inn by Marriott Harrisonburg is the Shenandoah Valley's best choice for the marathon business traveler or the relocating family. We feature fully equipped kitchens including full-size Energy Star appliances, a luxurious fitness center, a full size pool and whirlpool, complimentary hot breakfast buffet daily, complimentary high-speed internet, 37" LCD flat panel televisions with HD programming and evening socials for guests. Bring your dog because our hotel is pet friendly! When business travel or a recent move brings you to Harrisonburg, the Residence Inn by Marriott Harrisonburg makes you feel at home!
